definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: darkness (chiefly poet.)—´[[ח]] Ge 15:12 + 2 t., so rd. also prob. Mic 3:6 (for MT [[חָֽשְׁכָה]]); [[חֲשֵׁיכָה]] Ps 139:12; cstr. [[חֶשְׁכַּת]] Ps 18:12; pl. [[חֲשֵׁכִים]] Is 50:10; —darkness, opp. light ([[אוֹרָה]]) Psalm Ps 139:12; supernat., [[גדולה]] ´[[ח]] Ge 15:12 (JE); [[חֶשְׁכַּת־]] [[מַיִם]] Ps 18:12 in theoph. (but ‖ 2Sa 22:12 [[חַשְׁרַת־מים]] a mass of water); fig. = lack of understanding Ps 82:5; = distress Is 8:22 (‖[[חָרָה]]), Is 50:10.
